attributes.additional_details: we must leave the ECHR as this has gone beyond a joke they give more rights to terrorists murders and rapists than those of us who obey the law we must leave NOW! and establish a British and commonwealth bill of rights (dependencies if they agree will be protected under the British part of the bill) it is vital that we do this so we as nation can decide what we think is right for those that break the law not some human rights law maker who has no clue about the human cost and pain coursed by those that they are protecting
